text: I think the institution of marriage is a great idea, but for me it's just an idea.
author: Lara Flynn Boyle

text: Marriage was all a woman's idea and for man's acceptance of the pretty yoke, it becomes us to be grateful.
author: Phyllis McGinley

text: I prepare myself for rehearsals like I would for marriage.
author: Maria Callas

text: What is marriage but prostitution to one man instead of many?
author: Angela Carter

text: My relationship with Dean was great, but ultimately it wasn't a fulfilling marriage for either of us.
